entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS AROUND 50
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS AROUND 50
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE UPPER 50S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 40

SHOWERS LIKELY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
